crawl.description: crawls a reddit post with a given index and subreddit name

outputDir.name: outputDir
outputDir.description: output directory for results of run

postId.name: postId
postId.description: id of the post to be crawled

postUri.name: postUri
postUri.description: uri of the post or comment to be crawled

subredditName.name: subredditName
subredditName.description: name of the subreddit to be crawled

postIndex.name: postIndex
postIndex.description: index of the post to be crawled

minWords.name: minWords
minWords.description: minimum number of words to return

maxReplyDepth.name: maxReplyDepth
maxReplyDepth.description: maximum number of subcomments to return for each top-level comment

maxRepliesPerComment.name: maxRepliesPerComment
maxRepliesPerComment.description: maximum number of direct replies to return for each comment (not including sub-replies)

top.name: top
top.description: sort subreddit posts by top (of time period)

demo.description:
description of my command
    can be multiline

outputDir.name: outputDir
outputDir.description: output directory for results of run

follow.description: uploads a generated video to a target platform

outputDir.name: outputDir
outputDir.description: output directory for results of run

resetSession.name: resetSession
resetSession.description: start session without loading userDataDir or cookies

tags.name: tags
tags.description: tag which target users must be following

numFollows.name: numFollows
numFollows.description: number of users to follow this session

generate.description: generates media (of a given type) for a processed reddit post

outputDir.name: outputDir
outputDir.description: output directory for results of run

video.name: video
video.description: output video(s) for the target processed post(s)

thumbnail.name: thumbnail
thumbnail.description: output thumbnail(s) for the target processed post(s)

args.name: path
args.description: path to either (1) single processed post .json file, (2) directory containing multiple processed post .json files, or (3) directory of subdirectories containing processed post .json files.

helper.description: easily handles a target url end-to-end; crawls, processes, and generates a video.

outputDir.name: outputDir
outputDir.description: output directory for results of run

maxRepliesPerComment.name: maxRepliesPerComment
maxRepliesPerComment.description: maximum number of replies to each comment (breadth)

maxReplyDepth.name: maxReplyDepth
maxReplyDepth.description: maximum number of replies deep per chain (depth)

maxAudioLength.name: maxAudioLength
maxAudioLength.description: maximum length of audio to use in final video (in seconds)

speakingRate.name: speakingRate
speakingRate.description: speaking rate for generated TTS audio (in %)

args.name: postUri
args.description: url of the target reddit post

process.description: processes a reddit post with a given post .json file or directory

outputDir.name: outputDir
outputDir.description: output directory for results of run

maxRepliesPerComment.name: maxRepliesPerComment
maxRepliesPerComment.description: maximum number of replies to each comment (breadth)

maxReplyDepth.name: maxReplyDepth
maxReplyDepth.description: maximum number of replies deep per chain (depth)

maxAudioLength.name: maxAudioLength
maxAudioLength.description: maximum length of audio to use in final video (in seconds)

speakingRate.name: speakingRate
speakingRate.description: speaking rate for generated TTS audio (in %)

args.name: path
args.description: path to single post .json file or directory containing multiple post .json files to process

unfollow.description: uploads a generated video to a target platform

outputDir.name: outputDir
outputDir.description: output directory for results of run

resetSession.name: resetSession
resetSession.description: start session without loading userDataDir or cookies

numUnfollows.name: numUnfollows
numUnfollows.description: number of users to follow this session

randomOrder.name: randomOrder
randomOrder.description: randomly select the subset of users to unfollow (default is prioritize oldest follows)

upload.description: uploads a generated video to a target platform

outputDir.name: outputDir
outputDir.description: output directory for results of run

resetSession.name: resetSession
resetSession.description: start session without loading userDataDir or cookies

title.name: title
title.description: video title to enter into the 'Caption' field

testDetection.name: testDetection
testDetection.description: don't actually upload; instead, open bot detection testing page and save screenshot of results.

nContentRemaining.name: nContentRemaining
nContentRemaining.description: don't actually upload; instead, count number of remaining un-uploaded content items.

browser.name: browser
browser.description: name of browser executable to use (either 'chrome' or 'firefox')

args.name: path
args.description: path to single post video file or directory containing multiple post video files to upload
